page.title: 06ENTERPRISE PARK, SWANSEA
page.content: The 'Enterprise' Park is one of five being established in the Lower Swansea Valley, on land reclaimed from the devastation of the old metal industry. It is the largest enterprise zone in the U.K. Industry is pleasantly situated in a park-like atmosphere. The Park is sited in the north-east of Swansea, within easy reach of the docks and the M4. The Enterprise Park was established in 1981. Since then 51 new firms have been built on site, offering over 1000 new jobs to the area. There is a wide range of businesses in the Park,- supermarkets, furniture showrooms, DIY stores and light industry are all featured, with room for further industrial development. Swansea City Council have encouraged and assisted the establishment of firms in this Enterprise Park.
